definition: working couple (husband and wife both employed)

sentences.english: The reorganization plan of the enterprise shall be discussed by the congress of the staff and workers of the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 企业整顿方案应当经过企业职工代表大会讨论。

sentences.english: The leader criticized him in the meeting for the whole staff, hoping to caution others.
sentences.chinese: 领导在全体职工大会上批评他，目的是以一儆百。

sentences.english: More than a third of the workforce is now part-time or temporary employees.
sentences.chinese: 现在超过三分之一的工人成为兼职工或者临时工。

sentences.english: It requires a lot more than just being good at your job.
sentences.chinese: 那就需要在做好自己本职工作以外付出多得多的努力。

sentences.english: In which, the teacher of the masses is the major source of staff's amateur educational teachers.
sentences.chinese: 其中，群众教师是河南职工业余教育教师的主要来源。

sentences.english: They were all dual-earner couples -- both husband and wife held full-time jobs.
sentences.chinese: 研究对象都是双职工，即夫妇二人都有全职工作。

sentences.english: "Workers paid annual leave regulations" promulgated at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 《职工带薪年休假条例》同时出台。

sentences.english: Yuxi city leaders and various departments, cadres and workers of about 200 participants.
sentences.chinese: 玉溪市领导及各部门干部职工约200人参加。

sentences.english: Worker do sth without authorization asks all fee of doctor pay a home visit all provide for oneself by him worker.
sentences.chinese: 职工擅自请医生出诊的一切费用，均由职工本人自理。

sentences.english: Worker do sth without authorization asks all fee of doctor pay a home visit all provide for oneself by him worker.
sentences.chinese: 职工擅自请医生出诊的一切费用，均由职工本人自理。

sentences.english: We have fixed assets over several hundred millions and employees 1288.
sentences.chinese: 公司拥有固定资产数亿元，职工1288人。

sentences.english: Article 62 After childbirth, female workers shall be entitled to no less than ninety days of maternity leaves with pay.
sentences.chinese: 第六十二条女职工生育享受不少于九十天的产假。

sentences.english: Section 62. After childbirth, female workers shall be entitled to no less than 90 days of maternity leaves with pay.
sentences.chinese: 第六十二条女职工生育享受不少于九十天的产假。

sentences.english: Many a retired worker has hoped for a secure old age.
sentences.chinese: 许多退休职工都希望有一个无忧无虑的晚年。

sentences.english: I think lots of faculty feel that way.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得许多教职工都有这样的感觉。

sentences.english: The average income of the staff has been increased by 50percent compared with last year.
sentences.chinese: 与去年相比，该单位职工的收入增加了50。

definition: unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
labor contract/contract between employer and employees governing wages and conditions
